attributes.action: Provide COVID vaccinations to all people working in the early years sector
attributes.additional_details: Staff in early years settings are catching the virus despite following to the letter every bit of local and national guidance that exists relating to preventing its spread. It may appear to be safe because children don’t display symptoms, but this is the main problem - we don’t know who is infected. Early years staff are putting themselves and their families at risk and some are becoming extremely ill. If we are forced to continue remaining open to all children it’s vital that they are protected
attributes.background: Nurseries and Preschools have to stay open to all. We have been told that it’s safe because of the low transmission rate of Covid amongst children. We have seen first hand that this is no longer the case, especially with the new strain of the virus. Vaccinations are vital for all early years workers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566743
